title: Which nation has the best naval army?

replies.body:
Most skilled seafarers? That'd be too close to call between the coastal Freljord, and Bilgewater (although the Serpent Isles probably is a big part of that, being ancient mariners etc). Neither of them has a single, united "navy", though. Same for Ionia, as a whole continent.

Demacia probably has very little need for an actual navy - it's much easier to defend against attack from the sea, than to mount a naval attack of your own. I imagine their ships are pretty awesome, though!

We know Noxus has established naval bases on other continents, and also regularly uses the sea to travel and invade. If we're talking purely about military strength, and the size of the fleets, it is indeed most likely Noxus.

I'd probably give it to Bilgewater.  A lot of their lifestyle tends to favor naval combat, of which they'd be more experienced in.  I'd say this advantage alone could allow them to overcome other 'technologies'.

Where does Piltover/Zaun fall in all of this discussion of naval might? Given that they effectively control the only land bridge between two enormous land masses *and* that they control the only sea gate connecting two oceans, I can't imagine that they're anything *but* a naval power with significant defenses, if only because they're such a prime prize for anyone who manages to take them -- and don't even have much of an empire to launch a counterattack from the if the capital falls.
I think Ionia, because Ionia have best canon ship {{champion:62}} Wukong and {{champion:103}} Ahri
Fire nation had an amazing naval force but if the water tribe tried I'd give it to them.
This answer might not be so satisfying, but it's probably Noxus.

I would go with the Marai Nation... Because the whole Nation lives underwater... Sure, they dont have boats, but who needs those when you can breathe under water?

They can simply poke holes in the enemy ships and sink them without even being noticed if they wanted to.
I'd assume either Freljord or Bilgewater, since both are maritime nations.

"Best naval army" is kind of vague to derive anything from.

I have no clue if he was talking about being the most technologically advanced, having the largest number of ships, or having a crew with the most experience on the seas.

That does mean they can't have a navy. Not just because they aren't warlike but because there is no centralized government. Who foots the bill on the massive navy that needs to be maintained and requisitioned?

Theoretically if there was a threat that made all the people of Bilgewater put their ships together they would have a massive disorganized navy but as it stands any navy they have is private and falls to the whims of individuals not the nation as a whole.
